name: Oprichniki Bombardier
desc:
A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a specialized hover pack and explosive charges, and tasked with performing breaching operations.
As troops with immense breakthrough potential, bombardiers are often sent to the most dire of battlefields, making them the troops who gain meritorious promotions most quickly. It is said that Oprichniki officers overwhelmingly come from the ranks of the bombardiers.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>"Mine Now, Friend!"</color>
...As expected, your own weapon feels most natural.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Tattered Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders what resolve drove its bearer to sign up.

dropMaterial.name: Immaculate Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders if the exquisite styling might hide a price paid for its owner's promotion.

dropMaterial.name: Frost-Etched Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
Adorned by a frost-colored crystal â€” a symbol of glory. One wonders what deeds its bearer must have performed to prove their loyalty and worth.
